strapiPost.title: UAMS Ranked In Top 100 Best Nursing Programs
strapiPost.content:
The Nursing Schools Almanac recognized the University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences (UAMS) College of Nursing in its 2022 ranking of the nation’s 100 best nursing programs. 

  • In the top: The UAMS College of Nursing was the only school in Arkansas to make the Top 100. UAMS ranked No. 82 among 3,000 institutions examined, placing it among the top 3%. 
  • Showing success: The rankings were based on institutions’ academic prestige and perceived value, the success of students, and the breadth and depth of nursing programs offered. Among public nursing schools in the U.S., UAMS is listed as No. 44 out of more than 1,800. 

Read the full story HERE.
